about.name: Jonas Friedmann
about.bio: 23 year old network administrator, OS X user, Linux enthusiast, allergic to animals with hair/fur

dotfiles.name: dotfiles
dotfiles.short_description: Simple bork-based dotfile setup for both OS X and Linux systems.
dotfiles.description: Bork-based dotfile setup for Mac and Linux systems that is really simple and easy to understand.

pushbullet-osx-services.name: Pushbullet OS X Services
pushbullet-osx-services.short_description: A few services to push stuff to Pushbullet
pushbullet-osx-services.description: OS X services that allows you to quickly push stuff (selected text or files in Finder) to Pushbullet via the systems context menu (Rightclick -> Services). Probably obsolete when they release a native OS X app.
